mapper.select: SELECT RESOURCEID,CNNAME,ENNAME,RESOURCEKEY,PARENTID,REMARK,STATUS FROM FSMRESOURCE WHERE RESOURCEID not like '%sys\_%' AND RESOURCEID not like '%anonymous\_%'

SELECT R.RESOURCEID, R.CNNAME, R.ENNAME, R.RESOURCEKEY, R.PARENTID, R.REMARK, R.STATUS, CASE WHEN Z.RESOURCEID IS NULL THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END AS CHECKED, CASE WHEN (R.PARENTID !='0' AND Z.RESOURCEID IS NULL) THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END AS OPEN, CASE WHEN R.RESOURCEKEY = '#' THEN 'false' ELSE 'false' END AS CHKDISABLED FROM FSMRESOURCE R LEFT JOIN (SELECT A.RESOURCEID FROM FSMROLERESOURCE A WHERE A.ROLEID = #{roleid}) Z ON R.RESOURCEID = Z.RESOURCEID WHERE R.RESOURCEID NOT LIKE '%sys\_%' AND R.RESOURCEID NOT LIKE '%anonymous\_%'

SELECT R.RESOURCEID, R.CNNAME, R.ENNAME, R.RESOURCEKEY, R.PARENTID, R.REMARK, R.STATUS, 'false' AS CHECKED, CASE WHEN R.PARENTID = '0' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS OPEN, CASE WHEN R.RESOURCEKEY = '#' THEN 'false' ELSE 'false' END AS CHKDISABLED FROM FSMRESOURCE R
WHERE R.RESOURCEID NOT LIKE '%sys\_%' AND R.RESOURCEID NOT LIKE '%anonymous\_%'
